column1: Before I part with this Judgment, I might remind that, in terms

column2: No  (writ)  application  shall  be  dismissed  on  account  of  any
designation,  description,  or  address  of  such  respondent,  if

column4: identified  and  described,  and  has  not  been

column2: irregularity. The Court may make such order as it thinks fit
